product_name: Kiss My Face Sensitive Side Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30 - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: With its moisturizing, skin-soothing formula, the Kiss My Face Sensitive Side Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30 provides reliable, comfortable protection to sensitive skin while you soak up the sun.
short_description: With its moisturizing, skin-soothing formula, the Kiss My Face Sensitive Side Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30 provides reliable, comfortable protection to sensitive skin while you soak up the sun.
